PerfectNetExp.abs: 路德反对慈运格理(Zwingli),他主张照字句解释;在举行圣餐的时候,主耶稣乃与圣物同时临在,所以乃倡圣体共在论(Consubstantiation)代替变体说。此说由渥肯氏(Oceam).
consubstantiate 同物的, consubstantiation 同体论, consubstantiate 同质的

list.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译... ... consubstantialism 圣体合质论 consubstantiality 同体 consubstantiate 使成同体.
consubstantiality 同体consubstantiate 使成同体consubstantiation 圣体共在论
The Son is consubstantial with the Father ., 圣子与圣父同体.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(C5) - 商务英语词汇 ... constructor 构造函数 consubstantial 同质的 consuetude 习俗.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from modern Latin consubstantiatio(n-), from con- 'together', on the pattern of transubstantiatio(n-) 'transubstantiation'

means.word_mean: 1. the doctrine of the High Anglican Church that after the consecration of the Eucharist the substance of the body and blood of Christ coexists with the substance of the consecrated bread and wine
